name: INSIDER SG PTE. LTD.
description: Developer of an online marketing platform intended to optimize marketing spending and target online campaigns. The company's platform uses artificial intelligence and a unified data engine to individualize from a single platform and enhance cross-channel customer experiences, enabling clients to post campaigns with social networks and offer discounts only to those customers who are less likely to buy or subscribe.
one_liner: Developer of an online marketing platform intended to optimize marketing spending and target online campaigns. The company's platform uses artificial intelligence and a unified data engine to individualize from a single platform and enhance cross-channel customer experiences, enabling clients to post campaigns with social networks and offer discounts only to those customers who are less likely to buy or subscribe.
